title: In addition to the quantum of premium FSI mentioned in Table 6-A of Regulation No
clause_text: In addition to the quantum of premium FSI mentioned in Table 6-A of Regulation No.6.1.1 and Table 6-G of Regulation No.6.3, the additional premium FSI to the extent of TDR mentioned in the said table shall be allowed till the generation of TDR in Navi Mumbai Municipal Corporation area (1) and CIDCO as a Planning Authority by virtue of NTDA.
section: Allowance of premium FSI in lieu of TDR

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
